result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا
result.translation: As for those who believe and do righteous deeds, they will have gardens of Paradise[56] as a dwelling place[57],
result.footnotes:
[56] i.e., al-Firdaus: the highest level of Paradise.
 [57] It shows the regal fate of the believers.
